mapper.select: select msg.no as no, msg.room_id as room_id, msg.sender as sender, msg.message as message, msg.send_time as sendTime, u.name as senderName, u.profile as senderProfile from chat_message msg, user u where msg.sender = u.no and msg.room_id = #{roomId }
select name, profile from user where no = #{senderNo }
